infobox.Japanese title:: 図書館殺人事件  (Toshokan Satsujin Jiken)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Detective Boys  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Hiroshi Agasa  Shinichi Kudo
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Next Conan's Hint  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Isshin Chiba as Police detective  Ichiro Nagai as Shuji Tsugawa  Kaoru Morota as Clerk

sections.Situation: A routine afternoon at the library turns into the hunt for a corpse after an attendant turns up missing. When Conan and the Detective Boys try to solve the mystery by staying after-hours, they find themselves trapped, in the dark, and not alone. Will they catch the killer before he catches them?
sections.People:
- 57 years old
- Beika Library director
- Victim (missing)
- Beika Library employee
- Kazuo's wife
- Housewife
sections.Resolution: The books with the drugs had no spine, so Tsugawa hid the books in the kids section creating three rows of books instead of two. As a result the books looked uneven and unaligned due to the one book pushing the other book out to the other side, because of the third additional row of books.
sections.Anime:
- The names of the characters in the Funimation Dub are:
- Shuji Tsugawa - Sherman Tuttlebore
- Kazuo Tamada - Kyle Gearsbeck
sections.Remastered version: - A remastered version of this case was aired on March 15, 2014.
sections.Trivia: - The police detective that appears during Megure's questioning of Tsugawa has Takagi's earlier character design, but he wasn't voiced by Wataru Takagi. He was voiced by Isshin Chiba instead, who later would go on to inspire the creation of and provide the voice for Kazunobu Chiba.
